title: Sri Venkateswara Veterinary University: Courses, Admissions, Scholarships, Placements, Fees, Ranking
meta_description: Sri Venkateswara Veterinary University - [SVVU], Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh Application Form, Admissions, Contact, Website, Map, B.Tech, B.V.Sc, B.F.Sc . 48 Courses. Average Fees is 28414 per year.

basic_info.name: SVVU Ranking
description: Sri Venkateswara Veterinary University is constantly rated as top college in India by reputed agencies.

basic_info.name: SVVU Courses
description: The university offers various UG, PG and Diploma courses in Technology, Veterinary Science, and Agriculture.

basic_info.name: SVVU Placements
description: The SVVU has their Placement cell which ensures that the students get placed in the suitable companies, at suitable positions. The 2019 session of SVVU concluded with the record of 70%. The companies which come to the campus of SVVU are like Tech Mahindra, Infosys, Cognizant, Wipro, etc.

basic_info.name: SVVU Faculty
description: SVVU has very experienced Faculty for maintaining the teaching level of the institute:

basic_info.name: SVVU Facilities
description: Hostel: The University has separate hostels for boys & girls. Both the hostels have their own separate canteen facility. Facilities in the hostels were improved by establishing modern kitchen with steam cooking facility and by providing dining tables, chairs, utensils etc., for the mess. Cots, ceiling fans, and tables were provided in the rooms. Accommodation was provided to the parents, friends and visiting teachers.
Auditorium: SVVU has huge auditorium, which is used for any conference, events, convocation, any special functions etc.

Computer center and Placement cell: Each college has a computer center to provide internet and other services to the staff and students. At CVSc, Tirupati 26 computers are available with internet facility. At CVSc, Proddatur the library has 21 terminals with a server for providing a digital library. At NTR CVSc, Gannavaram there are 32 terminals with internet connectivity.

Library: The libraries in the constituent colleges of the university have a good collection of about 25,000 books, 70 National Journals, 54 International Journals, 138 Periodicals and Monthly Journals, 9,074 back volumes, 1851 Thesis of which 610 have digitalized and 238 video lessons.

faqs.question: Ques. What is the reservation for Ph.D. at SVVU?
faqs.answer: Ans.The maximum age limit for an aspirant to enrol in a Ph.D. program is 50 years as on July 1.Out of the total seats, 85% of the seats will be reserved for AP applicants and 15% seats will be open for both AP and Telangana applicants given that the latter category candidates appear for an entrance test.1/3rd of the total seats shall be reserved for women. If there won’t be any female candidate they they seats will be given to male candidates.

faqs.question: Ques. Does SVVU provide scholarships?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the scholarships are provided directly by the Govt. of Andhra to the students, where they pay all their academic fees. As well as, they also bare some daily expenses of the needy students.

faqs.question: Ques. What is the eligibility for AP-EAMCET?
faqs.answer: Ans.The general eligibility criteria for applicants to appear in AP EAMCET are:Indian Nationals/PIO (Persons of Indian Origin)/OCI (Overseas Citizen of India) Card Holders are eligible to apply.Candidates must have completed 16 & 17 years of age as on December 31.Students belonging to Andhra Pradesh/Telangana must have a domicile certificate.Applicants also need to meet the local/non-local status requirements as laid down in the Andhra Pradesh Education Institutions (Regulations of Admission) order, 1974.Candidates must have passed 10+2 or equivalent examination from a recognized Board /University with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and/or Botany and Zoology as compulsory subjects.Applicants who are appearing for the qualifying examination are also eligible to apply.

Section.name: About SVVU
Section.description:
Sri Venkateswara Veterinary University is a state university located at Tirupati, Chittoor district, Andhra Pradesh, India. It was established in 2005 by the Government of Andhra Pradesh and focuses on veterinary studies.
Sri Venkateswara Veterinary University offers various Undergraduate (UG) programs like B.Sc, B.V.Sc and B.Tech and Postgraduate (PG) programs such as M.Tech, MS, M.Sc and M.V.Sc along with Ph. D programs in different branches of Veterinary, Dairy and Fishery Sciences, to promote farmer oriented and need based research to develop harvest and post harvest technologies.
Selection in all the bachelors’ courses will be done on the basis of an entrance examination of Andhra Pradesh called EAMCET. The admission to M.F.Sc. and M.Tech will depend on the marks in B.F.Sc/B.Tech(Dairy) which will be 30% of the total weightage and on performance in PG Entrance test which will be 70% of the total weightage.
The Ph.D. selection will be done on the basis of marks in the entrance exam, master’s degree, bachelor’s degree and interview in the ratio 50:20:10:20.
Sri Venkateswara Veterinary University is constantly rated as top college in India by reputed agencies.
The university offers various UG, PG and Diploma courses in Technology, Veterinary Science, and Agriculture.

SVVU Courses.Details:
Duration: 4 years
			Eligibility: 10+2 with Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and English subjects
			Specializations: Dairy technology

Duration: 3 years
			Eligibility: 50% marks in 10+2 or Two Year Intermediate examination with the following subjects mainly English, Physics, Chemistry and Biology
			Specializations: Agriculture, Horticulture

Duration: 5 ½ years
			Eligibility: 50% aggregate marks in 10+2 with Biology, Physics, Chemistry and English subjects. For SC & ST candidates 5% less than that prescribed for general category i.e. 47.5%
			Specializations: N/A

Duration: 4 years
			Eligibility: 10+2 with Biology, Physics, Chemistry and English subjects
			Specializations: Fishery science

Duration: 2 years
			Eligibility: B.Tech (Dairying / Dairy Technology B.Sc (Dairy Technology) with secured minimum OGPA of 6.00/10.00 for general category (for SC/ST/PH-5.00/10.00) or 2.50/4.00 for general category (2.00/4.00 in case of SC/ST/PH ) or 60% marks
			Specializations: Dairy technology, Dairy microbiology

Duration: 2 years
			Eligibility: B.V.Sc and A.H with secured minimum OGPA of 6.00/10.00 for general category (for SC/ST/PH-5.00/10.00) or 2.50/4.00 for general category (2.00/4.00 in case of SC/ST/PH ) or 60% marks
			Specializations: Animal genetics & breeding, Animal nutrition, Livestock production management, Livestock product technology, Poultry science, Veterinary anatomy, Veterinary & animal husbandry extension education, Veterinary biochemistry, Veterinary bio-technology, Veterinary gynecology & obstetrics, Veterinary medicine, Veterinary microbiology, Veterinary parasitology, Veterinary pathology, Veterinary physiology, Veterinary public health & epidemiology, Veterinary surgery & radiology

Duration: 2 Years
			Eligibility: B.F.Sc from State Agricultural Universities with minimum OGPA of 6.00/10.00 for general category (for SC/ST/PH-5.00/10.00) or 2.50/4.00 for general category (2.00/4.00 in case of SC/ST/PH ) or 60% marks (for SC/ST/PH-55%)
			Specializations: Aquaculture, Fish processing technology, Fishery resource management, Aquatic environment management, Aquatic animal health management, Fish processing technology

Duration: 3 years
			Eligibility: Master's degree in relevant discipline
			Specializations: Animal & genetics breeding, Animal nutrition, Livestock production management, Livestock product technology, Poultry science, Veterinary anatomy, Veterinary & animal husbandry extension education, Veterinary biochemistry, Veterinary bio-technology, Veterinary gynaecology & obstetrics, Veterinary medicines, Veterinary microbiology, Veterinary parasitology, Veterinary pathology, Veterinary pharmacology & toxicology, Veterinary physiology, Veterinary public health & epidemiology, Veterinary surgery & radiology, Aquaculture, Aquatic animal health management, Fisheries recourse management.
